itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson is joined by special guest Jessie Wiseman in an emergency episode since our last episode was pulled down due to the threat of a lawsuit. In today's gem we discuss the nightmares of buying a car, as well as when someone surprises you with Jesus!

description:
Ross Patterson is joined by special guest Jessie Wiseman in an emergency episode since our last episode was pulled down due to the threat of a lawsuit. In today's gem we discuss the nightmares of buying a car, as well as when someone surprises you with Jesus!
